EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB Retail Contact a BDM Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting us: (Case: {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact},
We have received your {!Case.SLC_SupportType__c} request. One of our business development managers will be in contact shortly.
Regards, STANLIB Retail Distribution
{!Case.Email_Thread}
